lastSession.summary: Major v6.0.0 release: Replaced entire subagent pipeline with Agent Teams as sole orchestration model. Removed worktree support and --inline/--tdd flags. 3-specialist team (test-writer, implementer, reviewer) enforces TDD by design.
completedTasks: Replaced subagent pipeline with 3-specialist Agent Teams (test-writer, implementer, reviewer)
Removed --tdd flag (TDD always-on via team structure)
Removed worktree command and all worktree references
Removed --inline flag (inline is now the only mode)
Added TeammateIdle and TaskCompleted quality gate hooks
Synced all .claude/commands/ files with source commands/
Cleaned up all stale subagent/swarm references from README and other files
nextSteps: Run /claude-harness:setup on a test project to verify Agent Teams env var
Test /flow with Agent Teams specialist team

recentChanges: v6.0.0: Agent Teams as sole orchestration, removed worktrees/--tdd/--inline, always-on TDD
v5.2.1: Fix setup.sh for all cases including fresh install
v5.2.0: Plugin upgrade - worktrees, config, handoffs, semantic entities/constraints, auto-synced commands
v5.0.0: Opus 4.6 optimizations - effort controls, Agent Teams, 128K output, adaptive loops
v4.5.1: Fix version tracking - dynamic setup.md, stale state detection, cleanup legacy loops/
v4.5.0: Native Tasks integration - 5-task workflow chain with visual progress tracking
